attributes.review: Four years ago he promised to make America great again. In four years he’s made it worse than it ever has been. MAGA and vote for Biden.
attributes.title: Lying cheat

attributes.review: This is a HORRID app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. One day I was just scrolling through this app, minding my own racist business, when my phone started levitating. The app started cursing at me and flying around my room. It then grabbed my gun and shot my wife and kids. I Am devastated. President Trump, how could you?!!?!!?
attributes.title: murdered my whole family.

attributes.review: I was absolutely thrilled to download this wonderful seeming app. All of my trumpet and trumplet friends told me about it. I quickly realized that I couldn’t directly contact my lord and savior MAGA daddy trumpet.🤬🤯🧡This had me in tears 😭. Please do not waste your time downloading this app fellow trumpets and trumplets. God bless you all and remember. A dead Cheeto is a good Cheeto! 🙏💖✨
attributes.title: Trumpets beware 🙏💖✨

attributes.review: I thought since I was a white woman I was safe to download this app. I was wrong. It watched me while I was changing and commented on the size of it's own hands... (About the same size as mine and I have to wear children's gloves) it then used those tiny little sugar glider hands to try and grab my p*ssy. 0/10
attributes.title: Euge mistake
